AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Born in Colony
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is not a factory, but a MagiaPlant born to a mother in one of the colonies.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Attending School
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: For some reason, [PAWN_nameDef] had spent some time as a s student. Her experience there must have been a good opportunity for her to feel friendship.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Traveler
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] used to live in the same place all her life, but one day she felt the need to see the outside world. Then she said goodbye to her friends and set out on a journey alone.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Messenger of Justice
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had confidence in her mysterious power and continued to fight in various places to use this power for the benefit of others.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Silent Warrior
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] once experienced being betrayed by something. Because of this experience, she began to rely solely on her own strength.
